Text:
Thanks MM. After living abroad for many years many people need to go back to their own places. I always missed Poland and Warsaw, wherever I was. Then I miss these other places, sheer madness! And as far as dying is concerned - aren't you too young to even think about it?
Language in EE - in any case it's closer to what you can hear in a bus or street than BBC English.
I will try 'Call the midwife' and you keep up dreaming!
